level.heading: District life insurance benefits.
level.text: The District shall provide the group life insurance benefits set forth in § 1-622.07 to all employees of the District first employed after September 30, 1987, except those specifically excluded by law or by rule.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 1-610.63, § 1-622.16, and § 1-702.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-27
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-27, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-621.02.
